data.title: Platinum Titles
data.meta_description: Capcom IR website: Platinum Titles, Lists our hit titles that have individually sold more than 1 million units.
data.text:
1Jan 2018Monster Hunter: World

*Unit sales including Monster Hunter World: Iceborne Master Edition: 26.30 million units
